decision_conditions: The proposed illuminated advertisement, due to the size, siting, illumination and position located in a busy high street environment close to a pedestrian crossing and traffic lights will distract drivers attention from the traffic signals and could result in the harm to safety of drivers and pedestrians contrary to Policy T4 of the London Plan 2021 and Policy 36 of the Sutton Local Plan 2018.
description: Display of one internally illuminated digital advertisement display unit.
